lst.name: sentence
lst.str: De Clercq, who has taken a hard line on world trade problems at this weekend meeting in central Japan, said the EC appreciated Japan"s plans to cut exports and lift domestic growth instead.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japan has set an unofficial, voluntary 10 pct rise in car exports to the EC this year as part of its efforts to stop its rising trade surplus with the Community, which hit a record 18 billion dlrs last year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Over the period, the yen has risen against the dollar almost eight times as fast as against the European Currency Unit, he said.
